product_name: Royal Robbins Kick It Roll Up Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Go with the flow in the women's soft yet durable Royal Robbins Kick It Roll Up Pants. Keep 'em long when it's cool out, roll 'em up when the day warms up. Billy Goat(R) cotton slub canvas has a subtle texture and a touch of spandex added for stretch. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Button tabs hold the rolled up legs below the knees. Royal Robbins Kick It Roll Up Pants have front and rear pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Go with the flow in the women's soft yet durable Royal Robbins Kick It Roll Up Pants. Keep 'em long when it's cool out, roll 'em up when the day warms up.
